title: Coexistence of Humans and Nature: Work and Learning Perspectives through Literary Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Designed to allow learners to experience human-centered perspectives by combining face-to-face workshops and online discussions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interconnectedness of work and learning using literary metaphors
Learners can propose sustainable work methods by applying the "forest growth" model
Learners can develop learning plans considering social responsibility from a human-centered perspective
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
